mapper.select: /* getDicKeywordsListAll */ select idx, type, keyword, ratio, regdate, regid from dic_keywords order by type asc, ratio desc
select type from dic_keywords group by type
/* countDicKeywords */ select count(*) from dic_keywords where keyword = #{keyword}
mapper.insert: /* intDicNotMapKeywords */ insert into dic_notmap_keywords (type, keyword, ratio, regdate, regid) values (#{type}, #{keyword}, #{ratio} , now(), #{regid}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE regdate = now()
mapper.select: /* getDicNotMapKeywords */ select type,keyword,ratio,regdate,regid FROM dic_notmap_keywords order by regdate desc
